metadata.name: Loading Diagcab Package From Remote Path
metadata.comment: Detects loading of diagcab packages from a remote path, as seen in DogWalk vulnerability

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM script_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (metadata.event_code = 101 AND contains(lower(script.file.path), lower('\\')))

output.summary: Detects loading of diagcab packages from a remote path, as seen in DogWalk vulnerability

metadata.objective: False positive: Legitimate package hosted on a known and authorized remote location References: https://twitter.com/nas_bench/status/1539679555908141061, https://twitter.com/j00sean/status/1537750439701225472
